revision.text:
As you head back into the city, you lie still and wait for the cop to get you to the station. You close your eyes and will your body to relax.
Suddenly you hear him yell "'''Oh, fuck!'''" a split-second before there's a thunderous impact. The front half of the cop car is torn off, and you're flung out of the back half and land on a soft surface. You open your eyes to see that you're on a large grassy area. Your cuffs were ripped apart by the impact, and your hands are free. You walk over to where the front half of the cop car is lying, crumpled into a heap. the cop is clearly dead. the remains of the car that hit him are nearby. the driver is crumpled over what's left of the steering wheel, impaled on it. He's also dead. The car reeks of alcohol. ''Drunk and not wearing a seat belt.''
A tall blonde woman steps over to you. "I've called for an ambulance. That asshole tore through the red light and just nailed the police car."
You shake your head, still dazed. "I don't think that'll do any good. But thanks."
"Are you all right, miss?" the woman asks. "You're lucky to be able to walk away. Want to rest in my house for a bit, or use the ambulance that's on the way?"
